name: claude-memory-plugin
description: Claude Code plugin for memory skill system - persistent knowledge storage with semantic search, contextual gotcha injection, and graph-based knowledge management

scripts.test: bun run test:isolated && bun run test:main
scripts.test:isolated: bun test tests/unit/hooks/fork-detection.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/gotcha-injector.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/extract-context.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/spawn-session.spec.ts
scripts.test:main: bun test tests/unit/core tests/unit/scope tests/unit/types tests/unit/quality tests/unit/graph tests/unit/search tests/unit/hooks/pattern-matcher.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/subprocess.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/relevance.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/relevance-scorer.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/session-state.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/directory-protection.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/hook-logger.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/error-handler.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/semantic-search.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/session-cache.spec.ts tests/unit/hooks/hash-utils.spec.ts tests/contract tests/integration
scripts.test:coverage: bun run test:isolated -- --coverage && bun run test:main -- --coverage

author: GaZmagik
